TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Bsuring, title = Bsuring, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bsuring} }

S.FORM: == Bsuring == u sulit nu Hulam: 秀林部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Bsuring. u kasalumaluma' nu Bsuring sa, 321 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 1,054 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 1,008 ku tademaw, pakalatu 96%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 46 ku tademaw, pakalatu 4%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Taluku(Truku) 82%, Tayan(Tayal) 3%, Pangcah(Amis) 3%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, Seediq 1%, zumazuma 5%.. u niyazu' nu Taluku(Truku) u Taluku(Truku) a niyazu; kuyni, katuud ku Taluku(Truku) a tademaw itini. u zuma a tademaw sa, u Pangcah(Amis) u Yuwatan(Bunun) atu Seediq. u Sakizaya a tademaw izawtu ku Sakizaya itini, caayka tuud. nanusikawaw itini sa , sisa muengentu itini. u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 9 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 12 a bulad pulung sausi (565,561), Pangcah (211,031), Tayan (90,884), Paywan (101,472), Yuwatan (58,894), Rukay (13,392), Puyuma (14,340), Cou (6,667), Saysiat (6,662), Yami (4,629), Saw (799), Kabalan (1,482), Taluku (31,826), Sakizaya (958), Sejek (10,193), Laaluwa (404), Kanakanabu (343), zuma (11,585)

== Bsoring == o solit no Holam: 秀林部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Bsoring. o kasalomaloma' no Bsoring sa, 321 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 1,054 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 1,008 ko tademaw, pakalato 96%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 46 ko tademaw, pakalato 4%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Taloko(Troko) 82%, Tayan(Tayal) 3%, Pangcah(Amis) 3%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, Seediq 1%, zomazoma 5%.. o niyazo' no Taloko(Troko) o Taloko(Troko) a niyazo; koyni, katood ko Taloko(Troko) a tademaw itini. o zoma a tademaw sa, o Pangcah(Amis) o Yowatan(Bonon) ato Seediq. o Sakizaya a tademaw izawto ko Sakizaya itini, caayka tood. nanosikawaw itini sa , sisa moengento itini. o cidekay no Taywan yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 9 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 12 a bolad polong saosi (565,561), Pangcah (211,031), Tayan (90,884), Paywan (101,472), Yowatan (58,894), Rokay (13,392), Poyoma (14,340), Coo (6,667), Saysiat (6,662), Yami (4,629), Saw (799), Kabalan (1,482), Taloko (31,826), Sakizaya (958), Sejek (10,193), Laalowa (404), Kanakanabo (343), zoma (11,585)
